joke.error: There was an error fetching a joke.

count.success: Great! The current number is now {number}.
count.error_combined: Incorrect number! Your counter has been saved at {number}. You can save it using an item from the store or start from zero. Good luck!
count.error_broken: Wrong number. Your counter was saved at {number}. You can save it using an item from the store or start from zero. Good luck!
count.error_twice: You sent consecutive entries! The count has been reset.
count.error_wrong: Wrong number! The count has been reset.

stream.no_permission: You do not have permission to use this command.
stream.invalid_platform: Invalid platform. Please choose either "twitch" or "bluesky".
stream.setup_success: Stream or post checking set up for {streamerName} on {platform} in channel <#{channelId}>.
stream.bluesky_post_title: {streamerName} has a new post on Bluesky!

disable_count.success: The counting mini-game has been disabled.
disable_count.not_enabled: The counting mini-game is not enabled.
disable_count.error: There was an error disabling the counting mini-game.

disable_bluesky.error: There was an error disabling Bluesky ads.

disable_twitch.error: There was an error disabling Twitch ads.

store.no_permission: You do not have permission to use this command.
store.title: Store
store.corner_max: You have reached the maximum number of Corner Savers.
store.no_funds: You do not have enough coins to purchase this item.
store.corner_success: You have successfully purchased a Corner Saver!
store.counter_not_available: The Counter Saver item is not available right now.
store.counter_public: Your counter has been taken back! thanks to a purchase!
store.purchase_error: An unexpected error occurred during your purchase.
store.counter_cooldown: Counter Saver is on cooldown. Please try again in {remaining} day(s).

music.must_be_in_voice: You must be in a voice channel!
music.invalid_url: ‚ùå The provided URL is not valid: {url}

general.error: ‚ùå An unexpected error occurred. Please try again later.
